pages.text: $(li)The Snowy Tundra is a cold biome composed mostly of Dirt covered with a layer of snow and water lakes turned into ice lakes.$(br)$(li)It can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)Not many types of vegetation can survive in these hard conditions, just the Spruce trees and Poppies.

$(li)$(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/moose)Moose$(/l) can be found walking around this biome too.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome by typing the words $(l)Snowy Tundra$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
